title: The Lighthouse
plot: Two lighthouse keepers spiral into madness while living on a remote and mysterious island in the 1890s.

title: Inception
plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

title: Parasite
plot: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

title: The Matrix
plot: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Interstellar
plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Godfather
plot: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Pulp Fiction
plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: The Dark Knight
plot: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

title: Forrest Gump
plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man.

title: Titanic
plot: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: Gladiator
plot: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: Jurassic Park
plot: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

title: Fight Club
plot: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club with a soap salesman, leading to an anarchic rebellion against consumerism.

title: Avatar
plot: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
plot: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.

title: Schindler's List
plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution.

title: Saving Private Ryan
plot: In the midst of World War II, Captain Miller and his squad are assigned to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

title: The Avengers
plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: Black Panther
plot: T'Challa, the heir to the hidden kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and confront a challenger from his past.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
director: Bob Persichetti, Peter Ramsey, Rodney Rothman
plot: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, crossing paths with five counterparts from other dimensions to stop a threat to all realities.

title: Toy Story
plot: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

title: The Social Network
plot: As Harvard students create the social networking site that would become Facebook, they deal with legal battles and fallout from their success.

title: Finding Nemo
plot: A clownfish named Marlin sets off on a journey to rescue his son, Nemo, who has been captured by a diver.

title: Coco
plot: Despite his family's ban on music, Miguel dreams of becoming an accomplished musician. He embarks on a journey to the Land of the Dead.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
plot: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with Furiosa to escape a tyrant and his army in a high-octane chase.

title: Memento
plot: A man suffering from short-term memory loss uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife.

title: The Truman Show
plot: An insurance salesman discovers his entire life is a reality TV show, broadcast 24/7 to the world.

title: Braveheart
plot: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion against King Edward I of England.

title: Se7en
plot: Two detectives are on the hunt for a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his modus operandi.

title: The Big Lebowski
plot: Jeff 'The Dude' Lebowski is mistaken for a wealthy man and inadvertently gets drawn into a complex kidnapping plot.

title: Django Unchained
plot: A freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner with the help of a bounty hunter.

title: The Departed
plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: Zootopia
plot: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rabbit police officer and cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

title: The Shape of Water
plot: In a hidden high-security government laboratory in 1962, a lonely janitor forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature.

title: Her
plot: A lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
plot: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous hotel, and Zero Moustafa, a lobby boy who becomes his protégé.

title: Wonder Woman
plot: When an American pilot crashes on her sheltered island paradise and tells tales of a massive conflict, Diana leaves home to restore peace.

title: Get Out
plot: A young African-American man visits his white girlfriend's family estate, where he becomes ensnared in a more sinister reason for the invitation.

title: No Country for Old Men
plot: In the desert of West Texas, a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and takes a suitcase full of cash, triggering a violent cat-and-mouse chase.

title: The Revenant
plot: In the 1820s, a frontiersman on a quest for revenge against those who left him for dead after a bear mauling.

title: Arrival
plot: A linguist is recruited by the military to communicate with alien life forms after mysterious spacecraft land around the world.

title: Shutter Island
plot: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a prisoner from a mental institution on a remote island.

title: The Secret Life of Pets
plot: The quiet life of a terrier named Max is upended when his owner takes in Duke, a stray whom Max instantly dislikes.

title: The Conjuring
plot: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

title: The Intouchables
plot: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

title: Finding Dory
plot: The friendly but forgetful blue tang fish, Dory, embarks on a quest to find her long-lost parents.

title: La La Land
plot: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love while pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles.

title: Inside Out
plot: After Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions—Joy, Fear, Anger, Sadness, and Disgust—conflict on how best to navigate a new city.

title: The Martian
plot: An astronaut is presumed dead and left behind on Mars, where he must use his ingenuity to survive.

title: Beauty and the Beast
plot: An adaptation of the classic fairy tale about a monstrous prince and a young woman who helps him discover the meaning of love.

title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
plot: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student and his superhero alter ego Spider-Man.

title: A Star Is Born
plot: A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

title: The Greatest Showman
plot: The story of P.T. Barnum, who rises from nothing to create a spectacle that becomes a worldwide sensation.

title: Deadpool
plot: A former special forces operative turned mercenary undergoes a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers.

title: The Nun
plot: When a young nun at a cloistered abbey in Romania takes her own life, a priest and a novitiate are sent by the Vatican to investigate.

title: It
plot: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids confront their worst fears when they unleash a shapeshifting demon that takes the form of a clown.

title: Joker
plot: In Gotham City, a failed comedian descends into madness and becomes the criminal mastermind known as the Joker.
The lives of several people collide in one tragic event that takes place at 11:14 p.m.

title: Twelve Monkeys
plot: In a dystopian future, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about a deadly virus that wiped out most of humanity.

title: Trainspotting
plot: Renton, a young man in Edinburgh, tries to escape his addiction to heroin and the chaos that surrounds him.

title: The King's Speech
plot: In the years leading up to World War II, the heir to the British throne overcomes his speech impediment with the help of a speech therapist.

title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
plot: Tells the story of a man who is born old and ages backwards through his life, experiencing life in reverse.

title: Sing Street
plot: In 1980s Dublin, a teenage boy forms a band to impress a girl he likes, discovering his passion for music along the way.

title: Rocketman
plot: A musical fantasy about the fantastical human story of Elton John's breakthrough years.

title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
plot: A legendary warrior's sword is stolen, and she teams up with a young aristocrat to retrieve it, leading to a journey filled with deception and martial arts.

title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
plot: Peter Parker goes on a school trip to Europe, but he must step up to face new threats in the absence of Tony Stark.

title: The Shape of Water
plot: A mute woman forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature held captive in a government laboratory during the Cold War.

title: Ready Player One
plot: In a dystopian future, a teenager competes in a virtual reality treasure hunt to win a fortune and control of the OASIS, a virtual universe.

title: The Greatest Showman
plot: P.T. Barnum overcomes obstacles to create the circus that becomes a worldwide sensation.

title: The Florida Project
plot: Set over one summer, it follows a precocious six-year-old and her rebellious mother who live in a budget motel near Disney World.

title: Bird Box
plot: In a post-apocalyptic world, a mother and her two children must make it through a forest and river blindfolded to avoid supernatural entities.

title: A Quiet Place
plot: A family must live in silence to avoid blind monsters with acute hearing that hunt them down.

title: into the WildI
plot: Based on a true story, it follows a young man who gives up his possessions and savings to travel to Alaska and live in the wilderness.

title: Knives Out
plot: A detective investigates the death of a renowned crime novelist, unraveling a web of family secrets and lies.

title: Hacksaw Ridge
plot: A World War II medic who refused to carry a weapon saves dozens of soldiers while treating the injured during the Battle of Okinawa.

title: Midsommar
plot: A couple travels to Sweden for a festival and finds themselves entangled in a series of disturbing pagan rituals.

title: The Irishman
plot: An aged mob hitman recalls his possible involvement with the slaying of Jimmy Hoffa.

title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
plot: In 1969 Los Angeles, a faded television actor and his stunt double struggle to find their way in a Hollywood that they no longer recognize.

title: Soul
plot: A middle school band teacher has an out-of-body experience and learns about the importance of living in the moment.

title: The Trial of the Chicago 7
plot: The story of a group of anti-Vietnam War protesters charged with conspiracy and crossing state lines, resulting in a nationally televised trial.

title: Promising Young Woman
plot: A young woman seeks revenge against those who wronged her best friend while posing as a carefree party girl.

title: Dune
plot: A noble family becomes embroiled in a war for control over the galaxy's most valuable asset while its heir becomes troubled by visions of a dark future.

title: The Suicide Squad
plot: Supervillains are recruited to execute dangerous missions in exchange for reduced prison sentences.

title: No Time to Die
plot: James Bond has left active service but must return to confront a new villain who carries a dangerous technology.

title: West Side Story
plot: An adaptation of the classic musical about two rival gangs in 1950s Manhattan who fall in love.

title: The French Dispatch
plot: A love letter to journalists set in a fictional French city, showcasing several stories from the final issue of an American magazine.

title: The Matrix Resurrections
plot: Neo is back in a world that is more complex than he ever realized and must discover what is true.

title: Encanto
plot: A young girl in a magical family must discover how to save her home when the magic begins to fade.

title: King Richard
plot: The true story of Venus and Serena Williams' rise to fame, guided by their father, Richard Williams.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
plot: Peter Parker seeks the help of Doctor Strange when his identity as Spider-Man is revealed, leading to a multiverse showdown.

title: Ghostbusters: Afterlife
plot: A single mom and her two kids discover their connection to the original Ghostbusters and their grandfather's secret legacy.

title: The Tender Bar
plot: A boy seeks out father figures among the patrons at a bar in Long Island while discovering his path to adulthood.

title: Ridley Scott's House of Gucci
plot: The story of the downfall of the Gucci family, one of the world's most famous fashion houses, marked by betrayal and murder.

title: The Lost Daughter
plot: A woman grapples with her past as she becomes entangled with a young mother during a summer vacation.

title: Matrix Resurrections
plot: Neo and Trinity re-enter the Matrix for a new adventure.

title: Last Night in Soho
plot: In London, a fashion student discovers a dark secret about her past that connects her to a 1960s singer.

title: The 355
plot: When a top-secret weapon falls into mercenary hands, a wild group of female operatives must work together to recover it.

title: Scream
plot: A new killer emerges in Woodsboro and targets a group of teenagers, reviving the Ghostface killer legacy.
